Text: If the Cinavia audio watermark was not removed this may not play properly on PS3 or recent-model Blu-Ray players (the audio will be muted after a few minutes). If it does play on a stock PS3 with all current system updated I would really appreciate knowing that 8^).
PS3 is garbage with Cinavia.  Save yourself the hassle and get a Micca EP600 G2 media player.  No Cinavia.  Plus it plays 3D Bluray ISO files like this one.
